doc.field: osg-xsede host Taking a lot of errors

Hello,
osg-xsede is attempting to connect to another of our machines. We use this machine for remote logging, a feature we find quite useful. I'll ask Tom to investigate this and open the appropriate ports.
Scott.

Scott,
I am adding you to this ticket since Kyle is sick. Can you please look into this issue and provide feedback?
Thanks,
Chris
